title: keyboard vnc issue
author: FrederikSchack
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Pressing SHIFT+key besides RIGHT SHIFT should give a "/" with US keyboard mapping at server and local computer.
Pressing SHIFT+7 should give a "/" with Danish keyboard mapping at server and local computer.
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->

## Current Behavior
Pressing SHIFT+7 with Danish keyboard mapping gives "_"
SHIFT+6 gives "/" which is neither US or Da...

notes:
AI triage (claude): VNC keyboard input issues (stuck modifiers or key mapping failures) are a known usability bug in the VNC protocol layer that affects basic remote control functionality.
Approach: Investigate VNC keyboard event handling in ProtocolVNC.cs; check for stuck modifier keys (Ctrl/Alt/Shift not released on focus loss) and ensure SendKeyEvent calls are properly flushed; add focus-lost handler to release all modifier keys.
